Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the characters in *A Haunted House 2*?
Options:
A. a) Affion Crockett's character Ray-Ray is Marlon Wayans' gangster cousin.
B. b) Marlon Wayans' character Malcolm Johnson has a romantic relationship with Megan.
C. c) Megan is portrayed by Jaime Pressly.
D. d) Affion Crockett and Marlon Wayans are both involved in the same family dynamic.
Answer: a) Affion Crockett's character Ray-Ray is Marlon Wayans' gangster cousin., b) Marlon Wayans' character Malcolm Johnson has a romantic relationship with Megan., c) Megan is portrayed by Jaime Pressly.

Question: Which characters are related to each other in *A Haunted House 2*?
Options:

B. b) Marlon Wayans as Malcolm Johnson
C. c) Kisha Davis as Malcolm's cousin
D. d) All of the above
